divs: Sighting Details I've been a aircraft mechanic for 21 years. I spent 10 years as a helicopter mechanic, the rest a fix wing mechanic. I've seen a lot of aircraft, and weird things in the sky, but nothing like this. I just walked off a plane I was working on and outta the corner of my eye something caught my attention . I looked up and saw a bright light like a landing light off of a plane, but the run way is to my left to right this light is at a 90 deg. to the run way. the light looks like its coming right at me. I realized there is no position lights, and no wing landing lights, and even tho its dark you should see the silhouette of a out line of a aircraft. with this light there wasn't nothing. Then the light retreated from me very fast to a pin point, the size as a star in the sky, then zipped to my right, and disappeared.
